languages.text: После истребления Даргонуса на Янусе собрались уцелевшие сторонники предательского Вольного Торговца. Здесь случилось второе генеральное сражение, и хребет изменнической династии был сломлен. В трехдневной битве гусеницы танков вдавили в грязь знамена выродков, в пылающем урожае сгорели трупы еретиков, в ирригационных каналах утонуло их оружие. Еще много сезонов поля родили обильно, удобренные прахом отступников.

After the obliteration of Dargonus, the surviving forces of the renegade Rogue Trader gathered on Janus. Here the second major battle was fought, and the backbone of the treasonous dynasty was broken. In a three-day battle, the tank tracks drove the abomination banners into the mud and the heretics were burned along with the crops, their weapons drowned in the irrigation canals. Fertilised with the ashes of the apostates, the fields yielded a bountiful harvest for many seasons to come.
languages.original_text: После истребления Даргонуса на Янусе собрались уцелевшие сторонники предательского Вольного Торговца. Здесь случилось второе генеральное сражение, и хребет изменнической династии был сломлен. В трехдневной битве гусеницы танков вдавили в грязь знамена выродков, в пылающем урожае сгорели трупы еретиков, в ирригационных каналах утонуло их оружие. Еще много сезонов поля родили обильно, удобренные прахом отступников.

traits.locale_text: After the obliteration of Dargonus, the surviving forces of the renegade Rogue Trader gathered on Janus. Here the second major battle was fought, and the backbone of the treasonous dynasty was broken. In a three-day battle, the tank tracks drove the anathema banners into the mud and the heretics were burned along with the crops, their weapons drowned in the irrigation canals. Fertilized with the ashes of the apostates, the fields yielded a bountiful harvest for many seasons to come.

Here the second major battle was fought, and the backbone of the treasonous dynasty was broken. languages.text: 达戈努斯被毁灭之后，行商浪人剩余部队集结在了加努斯。第二次大战在这里打响，背叛帝国的冯·瓦兰修斯王朝被彻底摧毁。整场战斗持续了三天，无数坦克将诅咒的旗帜碾入淤泥之中。异端分子与庄稼被一把火烧光，叛军的武器也被丢到了水渠里。农田得到了叛徒骨灰的滋养，在接下来的许多个季节都大获丰收。
languages.original_text: After the obliteration of Dargonus, the surviving forces of the renegade Rogue Trader gathered on Janus. Here the second major battle was fought, and the backbone of the treasonous dynasty was broken. In a three-day battle, the tank tracks drove the anathema banners into the mud and the heretics were burned along with the crops, their weapons drowned in the irrigation canals. Fertilised with the ashes of the apostates, the fields yielded a bountiful harvest for many seasons to come.

traits.locale_text: 达戈努斯被毁灭之后，行商浪人剩余部队集结在了加努斯。第二次大战在这里打响，背叛帝国的冯·瓦兰修斯王朝被彻底摧毁。整场战斗持续了三天，无数坦克将诅咒的旗帜碾入淤泥之中。异端分子与庄稼被一把火烧光，叛军的武器也被丢到了水渠里。农田得到了叛徒骨灰的滋养，在接下来的许多个季节都大获丰收。

languages.text: ダルゴナスの殲滅の後、背教者のローグトレーダーの生き残りの部隊はヤヌスに集まった。ここで2番目に大きな戦いがあり、反逆の王朝の中枢は破壊された。3日間の戦いで、タンクローリーが呪うべき旗を泥土に落とし、異端者は穀物とともに焼かれ、彼らの武器は灌漑用水路に沈められた。背教者の灰で土地は肥沃になり、豊かな実りを長い年月の間もたらすことになる。
languages.original_text: After the obliteration of Dargonus, the surviving forces of the renegade Rogue Trader gathered on Janus. Here the second major battle was fought, and the backbone of the treasonous dynasty was broken. In a three-day battle, the tank tracks drove the anathema banners into the mud and the heretics were burned along with the crops, their weapons drowned in the irrigation canals. Fertilised with the ashes of the apostates, the fields yielded a bountiful harvest for many seasons to come.

traits.locale_text: ダルゴナスの殲滅の後、背教者のローグトレーダーの生き残りの部隊はヤヌスに集まった。ここで2番目に大きな戦いがあり、反逆の王朝の中枢は破壊された。3日間の戦いで、タンクローリーが呪うべき旗を泥土に落とし、異端者は穀物とともに焼かれ、彼らの武器は灌漑用水路に沈められた。背教者の灰で土地は肥沃になり、豊かな実りを長い年月の間もたらすことになる。

languages.text: Après l'anéantissement de Dargonus, les troupes survivantes {mf|du libre-marchand renégat|de la libre-marchande renégate} se rassemblèrent sur Janus. C'est là que se déroula la deuxième bataille d'envergure du conflit et que l'épine dorsale de la dynastie félonne fut brisée. Lors d'une bataille qui dura trois jours, les blindés firent passer les bannières anathématiques sous leurs chenilles et les hérétiques furent brûlés avec les cultures, tandis que leurs armes étaient noyées dans les canaux d'irrigation. Fertilisés par les cendres des apostats, les champs produisirent des récoltes abondantes pendant de nombreuses saisons.
languages.original_text: After the obliteration of Dargonus, the surviving forces of the renegade Rogue Trader gathered on Janus. Here the second major battle was fought, and the backbone of the treasonous dynasty was broken. In a three-day battle, the tank tracks drove the anathema banners into the mud and the heretics were burned along with the crops, their weapons drowned in the irrigation canals. Fertilised with the ashes of the apostates, the fields yielded a bountiful harvest for many seasons to come.

traits.locale_text: Après l'anéantissement de Dargonus, les troupes survivantes {mf|du libre-marchand renégat|de la libre-marchande renégate} se rassemblèrent sur Janus. C'est là que se déroula la deuxième bataille d'envergure du conflit et que l'épine dorsale de la dynastie félonne fut brisée. Lors d'une bataille qui dura trois jours, les blindés firent passer les bannières anathématiques sous leurs chenilles et les hérétiques furent brûlés avec les cultures, tandis que leurs armes étaient noyées dans les canaux d'irrigation. Fertilisés par les cendres des apostats, les champs produisirent des récoltes abondantes pendant de nombreuses saisons.

languages.text: Después de la destrucción de Dargonus, las fuerzas supervivientes de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente renegad{mf|o|a} se reunieron en Janus. Allí se libró la segunda gran batalla, y la fuerza principal de la traicionera dinastía cayó aplastada. En una batalla de tres días, las orugas de los tanques hundieron los estandartes anatematizados en el barro y los herejes ardieron junto a los cultivos, con sus armas perdidas en los canales de riego. Fertilizados con las cenizas de los apóstatas, los campos produjeron grandes cosechas durante muchas estaciones.
languages.original_text: After the obliteration of Dargonus, the surviving forces of the renegade Rogue Trader gathered on Janus. Here the second major battle was fought, and the backbone of the treasonous dynasty was broken. In a three-day battle, the tank tracks drove the anathema banners into the mud and the heretics were burned along with the crops, their weapons drowned in the irrigation canals. Fertilised with the ashes of the apostates, the fields yielded a bountiful harvest for many seasons to come.

traits.locale_text: Después de la destrucción de Dargonus, las fuerzas supervivientes de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente renegad{mf|o|a} se reunieron en Janus. Allí se libró la segunda gran batalla, y la fuerza principal de la traicionera dinastía cayó aplastada. En una batalla de tres días, las orugas de los tanques hundieron los estandartes anatematizados en el barro y los herejes ardieron junto a los cultivos, con sus armas perdidas en los canales de riego. Fertilizados con las cenizas de los apóstatas, los campos produjeron grandes cosechas durante muchas estaciones.

languages.text: Nach der Vernichtung von Dargonus sammelten sich die überlebenden Truppen {mf|des abtrünnigen Freihändlers|der abtrünnigen Freihändlerin} auf Janus. Hier fand die zweite Schlacht statt, bei der das Rückgrat der verräterischen Dynastie gebrochen wurde. In einer dreitägigen Schlacht schlugen die Panzer die Anathema-Banner, die Ketzer wurden zusammen mit dem Getreide verbrannt und ihre Waffen in den Bewässerungskanälen versenkt. Gedüngt mit der Asche der Apostaten, brachten die Felder viele Jahre lang reiche Ernten hervor.
languages.original_text: After the obliteration of Dargonus, the surviving forces of the renegade Rogue Trader gathered on Janus. Here the second major battle was fought, and the backbone of the treasonous dynasty was broken. In a three-day battle, the tank tracks drove the anathema banners into the mud and the heretics were burned along with the crops, their weapons drowned in the irrigation canals. Fertilised with the ashes of the apostates, the fields yielded a bountiful harvest for many seasons to come.

traits.locale_text: Nach der Vernichtung von Dargonus sammelten sich die überlebenden Truppen {mf|des abtrünnigen Freihändlers|der abtrünnigen Freihändlerin} auf Janus. Hier fand die zweite Schlacht statt, bei der das Rückgrat der verräterischen Dynastie gebrochen wurde. In einer dreitägigen Schlacht schlugen die Panzer die Anathema-Banner, die Ketzer wurden zusammen mit dem Getreide verbrannt und ihre Waffen in den Bewässerungskanälen versenkt. Gedüngt mit der Asche der Apostaten, brachten die Felder viele Jahre lang reiche Ernten hervor.

languages.text: Dargonus'un yok edilmesinin ardından kaçak Hür Tacir'in kalan kuvvetleri Janus'ta toplandı. Burada büyük çaplı ikinci bir muharebe gerçekleşti ve hain hanedanlığın omurgası kırılmış oldu. Üç gün süren muharebe sırasında tankların paletleri, lanetlilerin bayraklarını çamura gömdü ve kâfirler, ekinlerle birlikte yakıldı, silahları ise sulama kanallarının dibini boyladı. Dinsizlerin külleriyle bereketlenen tarlalar, birçok mevsim boyunca bol hasat verdi.
languages.original_text: After the obliteration of Dargonus, the surviving forces of the renegade Rogue Trader gathered on Janus. Here the second major battle was fought, and the backbone of the treasonous dynasty was broken. In a three-day battle, the tank tracks drove the anathema banners into the mud and the heretics were burned along with the crops, their weapons drowned in the irrigation canals. Fertilised with the ashes of the apostates, the fields yielded a bountiful harvest for many seasons to come.
